channel.title: EmporioScape V1
channel.description:
Hey guys this is my V1
DeltaScape based & this is my first ever source realise so please dont be harsh , i would like helpfull criticism please :)
Features -
Skills -
- Firemaking - woodcutting - mine - smithing - fletching - cooking - runecrafting - agilty - herb - thiev - crafting - farming
- Godwars (graador) - Jad - King Black Dragon - Kalphite queen
- Range Projectile - Mage Projectile - Barrows effect works (dharoks hits higher with low hp , Guthans heals when hit , karil drains run energy , verac hits past pray , ahrims steals run energy) - DFS spec hits with flames (a random spec in combat , moves when walking like any other shield)
actually has a eco without partyhats and rares in shops , all drops in npc`s make a good eco i have lowerd drops from barrows npc`s to help the eco further
Pictures -
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/donarzoneandshops.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/hopeandshop.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/multitrain.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/orbs.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/pkreward.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/pkingzones.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/skillsarea.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/trainareas.jpg[/img]
Thanks for reading & comment please ;)
No virus scan , since its against the rules plus there isnt ant .exe files in the source.
Download Links -
Source - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?z5zn5jiinmy Client - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zeoc2momea4
Client has hidden files though , here is how to show them -
[u]Go to "Computer" or "My Computer" for XP[/u]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/jtyjtyj.jpg[/img]
[u]Then go to "organize" then "folder and search options"[/u]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/uyr6yerthsr.jpg[/img]
[u]Go to "view" tab and there is a folder called "hidden files & folders" you then click the circle that says "show hidden files and folders"[/u]
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/jhryjrty.jpg[/img]
[u]And you will now be able to see them.[u/]
Credits
reverce Delta` Lewis) (me) Mopar help & tutorial section.

item.title: EmporioScape V1
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

[quote=“trytohaxme, post:5, topic:302163”]Yea my Rune-Warfare release was Delta, I got bored of it fast.
Seems okay though - Shouldn’t add commands always ruins economy’s of the source.[/quote]

Thanks , i wont next time because i always struggle to make a good economy hopefully next time i will be using final devo

Read full topic

item.title: EmporioScape V1
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

pk3r john:

Meh. It’s ok. Make it look less delta-ish though.

Yeah , i got very bored with delta so i didnt , was planning on changing the jad to 20 waves & adding new assault and i was going to change the pc interface…

as i say i got bored.

item.title: EmporioScape V1
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

Hey guys this is my V1

DeltaScape based & this is my first ever source realise so please dont be harsh , i would like helpfull criticism please

Features -

Skills -

  • Firemaking

  • woodcutting

  • mine

  • smithing

  • fletching

  • cooking

  • runecrafting

  • agilty

  • herb

  • thiev

  • crafting

  • farming

  • Godwars (graador)

  • Jad

  • King Black Dragon

  • Kalphite queen

  • Range Projectile

  • Mage Projectile

  • Barrows effect works (dharoks hits higher with low hp , Guthans heals when hit , karil drains run energy , verac hits past pray , ahrims steals run energy)

  • DFS spec hits with flames (a random spec in combat , moves when walking like any other shield)

actually has a eco without partyhats and rares in shops , all drops in npcs make a good eco i have lowerd drops from barrows npcs to help the eco further

Pictures -

hopeandshop.jpg768×548

multitrain.jpg770×553

pkingzones.jpg826×635

skillsarea.jpg771×554

trainareas.jpg868×589

Thanks for reading & comment please

No virus scan , since its against the rules plus there isnt ant .exe files in the source.

Download Links -

Source - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?z5zn5jiinmy
Client - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zeoc2momea4

Client has hidden files though , here is how to show them -

Go to “Computer” or “My Computer” for XP

jtyjtyj.jpg402×679

Then go to “organize” then “folder and search options”

Go to “view” tab and there is a folder called “hidden files & folders” you then click the circle that says “show hidden files and folders”

[u]And you will now be able to see them.[u/]

Credits

reverce
Delta`
Lewis) (me)
Mopar help & tutorial section.
